pic1_alt: A map of the continental United States, labeled Haunted Places in the United States. Haunted places is in scare quotes. The US is shown in dark gray, with semi-transparent white ghost emojis at locations identified as haunted. The ghosts are thickest on the east coast, in Detroit, and in southern California.
pic2_alt: A screenshot of the Shadowlands.net Haunted Places Index. The website looks like the ghost of websites past, with a red, carpet-like background, an animated banner, and multiple fonts and background colors. The page helpfully warns to never trespass on any of these locations.
